segments.advisor_message: So now, uh, about your health status—it’s imp—important for us to check it. Can you tell me, um, how you’re feeling? Like, uh, any issues or, you know, your general health right now?
segments.client_message: Uh, yeah, I mean, I'm not feelin' super great. Honestly, I’ve been, like, really tired a lot lately. I don’t know if it’s, um, that I’m not eatin’ right or what, but I also smoke. I smoke, like, a pack a day since I was, um, 18?

segments.advisor_message: Okay, got it. And, uh, about the long-term health care, do you think you might need any—?
segments.client_message: Well, I’ve been thinkin’ I might need some kinda help down the road—outta breath easy, you know? And I just realized I don’t even have a will or, like, power of attorney in place, stuff like that.
